EmailTemplate.description: Sent to customer once we receive their signed contract
EmailTemplate.name: Signed Contract Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for signing your contract
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This email is to let you know we've received your signed contract.
The next steps are: 1) Please send either a photo or digital version of your last electric bill 2) Please send a photo of a voided check 3) Lastly, we will need to conduct a confirmation call with our financiers. Let me know what time works best for you. The call only takes a few minutes.
Thanks and let me know if you need anything.
David 504.708.1518 (o) 314.323.7745 (m)
